App.jsx.description: This page handles routing of the frontend pages.

pages/HomePage.jsx.description: Main page for the shopify admin app.

quiz.description: Serves as the framework for creating and storing quizzes.

create.description: When a quiz is created, we also have to generate an "ID"/slug (ie. My Cool Quiz -> my-cool-quiz)
We hook into this to find out which store front version a shop uses.

update.description: We hook into this to find out which store front version a shop uses.

quiz.description: Quizzes will have to be fetched by people who visit the shop.

tenancy/shopifyTheme.gelly.description: Has been added so that merchants are only able to read themes from their store.

package.json.description: Holds a list of all the dependencies for the project.

index.html.description: The home, entrypoint and main file that's served.

webflow.title: Product Quiz
webflow.description: Recommend products to Shopify customers based on their answers to a quiz using Gadget.
